xal.service.mpstool

Interface MPSPortal


  • public interface MPSPortal
    MPSPortal is the interface to remote clients

    • Method Detail

      • getProcessID

        int getProcessID()
        Get the process ID of the process in which the service runs or 0 if it is unknown

      • shutdown

        void shutdown(int code)
        Shutdown the process.
        Parameters:
        code - The shutdown code which is normally just 0.

      • getHostName

        java.lang.String getHostName()
        Get the name of the host where the application is running.
        Returns:
        The name of the host where the application is running.

      • getLaunchTime

        java.util.Date getLaunchTime()
        Get the launch time of the service.
        Returns:
        the launch time in seconds since the Java epoch of January 1, 1970.

      • logsStatistics

        boolean logsStatistics()
        determine whether the monitors log statistics

      • getMPSTypes

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getMPSTypes()
        Get the list of MPS latch types. Monitors are listed as an array and their index in this array can be used in several methods to reference a specific monitor.
        Returns:
        the list of MPS latch types as strings (e.g. "FPL", "FPAR")

      • isRunning

        boolean isRunning(int monitorIndex)
        Determing if the correlator is running.
        Parameters:
        monitorIndex - index of the monitor to test if its correlator is running
        Returns:
        true if the correlator is running and false otherwise.

      • stopCorrelator

        void stopCorrelator(int monitorIndex)
        Stop looking for MPS trips
        Parameters:
        monitorIndex - index of the monitor that should stop its correlator

      • restartCorrelator

        void restartCorrelator(int monitorIndex)
        Restart the poster after a pause
        Parameters:
        monitorIndex - index of the monitor that should restart its correlator

      • reloadSignals

        void reloadSignals(int monitorIndex)
        Reload the MPS signals from the signal data source for the specified monitor.
        Parameters:
        monitorIndex - index of the monitor that should reload its signals

      • getLastEventTimes

        java.util.Date[] getLastEventTimes(int monitorIndex)
        Get an arry of timestamps corresponding to the different event ids. The values are Date objects that indicate the time the last event of the specified type had happened. This method may be used by clients to determine if their information is current.
        Parameters:
        monitorIndex - index of the monitor whose timestamps are requested
        Returns:
        an array of timestamps

      • getMPSChannelInfo

        java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> getMPSChannelInfo(int monitorIndex)
        Get the list of all MPS PVs we are attempting to monitor and log. The information is returned as a list of channel info tables (one entry for each PV). The channel info table has the CHANNEL_PV_KEY and CHANNEL_CONNECTED_KEY keys and provides the signal name and the connection status of a channel.
        Parameters:
        monitorIndex - index of the monitor whose channel info is requested
        Returns:
        The list of all MPS PV info tables for the PVs we are attempting to monitor and log

      • getInputChannelInfo

        java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> getInputChannelInfo(int monitorIndex)
        Get the list of all Input PVs we are attempting to monitor and log. The information is returned as a list of channel info tables (one entry for each PV). The channel info table has the CHANNEL_PV_KEY and CHANNEL_CONNECTED_KEY keys and provides the signal name and the connection status of a channel.
        Parameters:
        monitorIndex - index of the monitor whose channel info is requested
        Returns:
        The list of all PV info tables for the Input PVs we are attempting to monitor and log

      • getFirstHitText

        java.lang.String getFirstHitText(int monitorIndex)
        Get the summary of first hit statistics
        Parameters:
        monitorIndex - index of the monitor whose statistics are to be fetched
        Returns:
        the first hit statistics summary

      • getMPSTripSummary

        java.lang.String getMPSTripSummary(int monitorIndex)
        Get the summary of MPS trips.
        Parameters:
        monitorIndex - index of the monitor whose statistics are to be fetched
        Returns:
        summary of MPS trips

      • getMPSEventsSince

        java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> getMPSEventsSince(int monitorIndex,
                                                                                   java.lang.String timeStr)
        Get the list of MPS events since the specified time
        Parameters:
        monitorIndex - index of the monitor whose statistics are to be fetched
        timeStr - a string representation of the reference time
        Returns:
        the latest processed MPS events since the specified time

      • getLatestMPSEvents

        java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> getLatestMPSEvents(int monitorIndex)
        Get the list of latest MPS events
        Parameters:
        monitorIndex - index of the monitor whose statistics are to be fetched
        Returns:
        the latest ordered list of MPS events
